metadata.title: CVE-2020-27918 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management. Thisissue is fixed in macOS Big Sur 11.0.1, watchOS 7.1, iOS 14.2 and iPadOS14.2, iCloud for Windows 11.5, Safari 14.0.1, tvOS 14.2, iTunes 12.11 forWindows. Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrarycode execution.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
